title: CoverageBranchesBas
description: Schema to cover BAS generator branches: array items type [string,null], array of objects, scalar null (unsupported)

nullableStringArray.description: Array with items type as array to cover Array.isArray(resolvedItems.type)

objectArray.description: Array of objects to cover case 'object' in items switch

unsupportedScalar.description: Unsupported scalar type to cover default in scalar switch

arrayItemsNull.description: Array items type [null] to cover default case in items switch
